articles.description: January's possible transfer merry-go-round involves both Arsenal and Liverpool and sees the Gunners potentially offload some deadwood and the Reds make a new signing
articles.content:
It wouldn't be deadline day without a transfer merry-go-round on the cards.
They're very rarely pulled off as it takes too many things going right in a single day to make all the deals possible. But… [+2021 chars]

articles.title: 'Humiliated' Isco demands Real Madrid exit to put Premier League clubs on red alert - Mirror Online
articles.description: The attacking midfielder has barely featured under Zinedine Zidane this season and is said to be furious after his latest snub
articles.content:
Real Madrid's Isco has reportedly asked for a move away from the club before the close of the winter transfer window.

articles.author: Daniel Davis
articles.title: Graeme Souness urges Gareth Bale to kick up a fuss over his lack of Tottenham game time - Daily Mail
articles.description: Bale was handed a rare start at the Amex on Sunday evening in the absence of crocked talisman Harry Kane, but found himself hauled off after an hour following a limp performance.
articles.content:
Graeme Souness believes Gareth Bale must kick up a fuss at Tottenham due to his lack of playing time - despite the Real Madrid loanee delivering another below-par showing in the defeat by Brighton.

articles.author: Mike Keegan
articles.title: Manchester United beef up security for Anthony Martial following disgusting racist abuse - Daily Mail
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE BY MIKE KEEGAN: Martial's wife, Melanie, took to Instagram to reveal that she had been subjected to further abuse which included death threats to both herself and her husband.
articles.content:
Manchester United have approached Anthony Martial to help with security at his house after racist trolls targeted him and his wife online.
